concept.title: 18.114 Contracting with the Small Business Administration (The 8(a) Program).

conbody.p: Contracts may be awarded to the Small Business Administration (SBA) for performance by eligible 8(a) participants on either a sole source or competitive basis. (See subpartÂ 19.8 .)
